extendedInfo.description: Are you tired like me to go back and forth to check the charts of your favorite stocks??? This application was made for you!This app allows you to quickly build a favorite list of stocks (watch list) and display many charts in one single page.You can then review these CHARTS quickly and SORT them in different ways ...Start by selecting one of the major list/index:- Dow Jones Industrial Average- Nasdaq 100- S&P 100- Favorites (your favorite list of stocks)- MorningStar Wide Moat Focus- China ADRs- Sector ETFsâââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââ  YOU CAN ALSO ADD YOUR OWN STOCKS => THIS IS HOW:Select "Favorites" > at the very bottom of the screen > Select "Add own stocks"ââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââ(Other lists you will find in the PRO version of this app:- New Highs- New Lows- Top Gainers- Top Losers- Overbought- Oversold- Unusual Volume- Broker Upgrades- Broker Downgrades- Earnings before market- Earnings after market- Insider buying- Insider selling- Channel Up/Down- Triangle Asc/Desc- Double Top/ Bottom- Multiple Top/Bottom- Head & Shoulders/Inverted- Wedge Up/Down- Trendline Support/Resistance/Hoizontal- Most Active- Major News- (Inverted) Hammer- (Dragonfly/Gravestone) Doji- Long Upper/Lower Shadow- Spinning Top White/Black- Marubozu White/Black- High Sales Growth QoQ- Earnings Today (before Market Open/ after Market Close)- EarningsTomorrow - Earnings Next 5 Days, This week, Next week, This month- Float Short > 20% (Large / Mid / Small / MicroCap )==> The app will display the charts of all the stocks within the chosen list in a few batches.Please choose in what order you want to see these stocks/charts:- Ticker - Company name- Gainers / Losers of the day- Market Cap- Volume- P/E- Beta- Money Flow- Last vs 52 weeks High- Last vs 52 weeks Low- After-hours/before-hours changeView the list of stocks in ascending (select âAscâ) or descending order (select âDescâ).Please choose how many stocks/charts you want to see per page/batch:1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 10 or 20.Finaly choose the timeframe of charts:- Daily- Weekly- MonthlyAnd the type of charts:- Candle charts- Line charts- Advanced charts (with trendlines and moving averages)Scroll down through the list of charts and at the bottom click on âNext 10 chartsâ to see the next batch of charts ...On any chart :- CLICK to zoom in a particular chart (pinch with your 2 fingers to zoom-in/out and scroll left and right) âââ LONG CLICK to add the stock to your favorite list  âââA stock that has been added to your favorite list of stocks is shown with a *STAR before its name.We hope that youâll enjoy this app and that it will save you time going through hundreds of charts...Regards,WaveStock.comCharts are coming from FINVIZ - Thank you so much Alex.Copyright Â© 2010 FINVIZ.com. All Rights Reserved.âââ It is still under development, so please rate it accordingly âââ Please take a few seconds to SHARE the app on Twitter, Facebook, Google+ or any preferred venue as more downloads = I'll spend more time to develop this app further!Thank You.keywords: charts, charts and graphs, stocks, stocks app, stocks widget, stocks yahoo, wallstreet, wallstreet survivor, wallstreetsurvivorâââ If the app force closes from time to time, please use less than 20 charts per page (we're investigating why it doesn't work well on some devices). Thank you for your understanding. ââââââ Mainly for US & Canadian listed stocks + international ADR âââ

reviews.title: EXCELLENT APP
reviews.comment: GOOD APP, I USE IT EVERYDAY.  ALTHOUGH GOOD, I WOULD SUGGEST DEVELOPER TO ADD MORE JAP CANDLE PATTERNS, WITH THESE PATTERNS ADDED, PROGRAM COULD BE CHARGED MORE, CAUSE THERE S DEMAND FOR IT!!!
reviews.author: Khanh Nguyen

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: But now on my HTC One, the multiple charts view displays the charts in very small format, as to be unreadable. Please dev fix, then it will be 5 stars. Thank you.
reviews.author: Naji Chehabeddine

reviews.title: EXCELLENT APP
reviews.comment: I use it everyday. Very good candle chart. Thnx  Would like to see maby an option to see just the trading day. Like 5 min
reviews.author: Dean Abernathey

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: Please utilize my $3.50 wisely as I intend to do the same with the app. Long live Google!
reviews.author: Taylor Golmon

reviews.title: Great Stock App!
reviews.comment: Great app, a lot of data on one page! Now how do I add my own stocks, there is no Favorites at the bottom?...lol
reviews.author: Alphonse Faggiolo

reviews.title: Good overall
reviews.comment: Very  useful app if swingtrade. Please add more technical scans.
reviews.author: P chari

reviews.title: Chaz
reviews.comment: This is a Very Interesting application! I have only recently purchased the app and hope to put it thru its paces this week. I, like Khan, have a request: can you add Flag Price Patterns and scans for Inside Bar and Engulfing Bar Candle Patterns?
reviews.author: C Silas

reviews.title: chart pro can\'t update
reviews.comment: can\'t update the  licence, plz fix it
reviews.author: joe ma

reviews.comment: Awesome app. Have always enjoyed Finviz. Only $4. What a deal!. Thank you.
reviews.author: A Martinez

reviews.title: Great bargain.
reviews.comment: Great app, well on its way to five stars with a little fine tuning. You can add your own stocks. Edit: found a bug, developer quickly fixed it.  Makes for quick hunting for chart patterns.
reviews.author: Edgar Hume

reviews.title: Works as advertised.
reviews.comment: Initially I had issue with this app but the devs addressed them and eliminated them. Thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good stuff but would be better with news for individual stocks plus adjustable charts with time period and a few indicators
reviews.author: Rico Yawndman

reviews.title: So far so good.
reviews.comment: Will report back if any changes.
reviews.author: Sim Gill

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Gives a wonderful overview of overall Markets but shame that we can not add our own stocks
reviews.author: Yave Canela

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: This app is the perfect tool for quickly scanning through my watch list. I love the feature that estimates trendlines and other types of analysis. It is incredibly simple to use, but does exactly what I want it to do. Easily worth the price of the upgrade to pro.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: @Mordechai
reviews.comment: Ads have been removed in PRO version (version 1.14 and above) - it was there by mistake, sorry about this. Your 1 star rating is pretty harsh isn\'t it???
reviews.author: A Google User
